messages.subject: Re: A kind of side question about homeschooling news
messages.msgSnippet: I get unschooling news to my inbox using googles alert service. Here s the link: http://www.google.com/alerts Might be worth looking into if you don t already.
messages.messageBody:
I get unschooling news to my inbox using googles alert service.
Here's the link:
http://www.google.com/alerts

Might be worth looking into if you don't already.

~ Joanne ~
Mom to Jacqueline (7), Shawna (11) & Cimion (13)
Adopted into our hearts October 30, 2003
http://anunschoolinglife.blogspot.com/

messages.subject: A kind of side question about homeschooling news
messages.msgSnippet: So... If any of you wish you had a way to get news about homeschooling or unschooling (such as momentous legal happenings, or newly published articles or
messages.messageBody:
So...

If any of you wish you had a way to get news about homeschooling or
unschooling (such as momentous legal happenings, or newly published
articles or books), maybe bookmark this:

http://unschooling.blogspot.com

And if any of you already HAVE some way to get such news, it would be
friendly and generous of you to go there and put the name and maybe
even a link to that source. Some people subscribe to lists or online
newsletters. Some go to websites now and again, or subscribe to
announcements for blogs.

If you have a favorite homeschooling news source and could share it,
that would be very nice.


Thanks,

Sandra
